key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not

key.name: is-absolute
key.description: Enable this to set the tablet to absolute mode.

key.name: area
key.description: Set this to x1, y1 and x2, y2 of the area usable by the tools.

key.name: keep-aspect
key.description: Enable this to restrict the Wacom tablet area to match the aspect ratio of the output.

key.name: rotation
key.description: Set this to “none”, “cw” for 90 degree clockwise, “half” for 180 degree, and “ccw” for 90 degree counterclockwise.

key.name: touch
key.description: Enable this to move the cursor when the user touches the tablet.

key.name: tablet-pc-button
key.description: Enable this to only report stylus events when the tip is pressed.

key.name: display
key.description: EDID information of monitor to map tablet to. Must be in the format [vendor, product, serial]. ["","",""] disables mapping.

key.name: pressurecurve
key.description: Set this to x1, y1 and x2, y2 of the pressure curve applied to the stylus.

key.name: buttonmapping
key.description: Set this to the logical button mapping.

key.name: pressurethreshold
key.description: Set this to the pressure value at which a stylus click event is generated.

key.name: pressurecurve
key.description: Set this to x1, y1 and x2, y2 of the pressure curve applied to the eraser.

key.name: buttonmapping
key.description: Set this to the logical button mapping.

key.name: pressurethreshold
key.description: Set this to the pressure value at which an eraser click event is generated.

key.name: action-type
key.description: The type of action triggered by the button being pressed.

key.name: custom-action
key.summary: Key combination for the custom action
key.description: The keyboard shortcut generated when the button is pressed for custom actions.

key.name: custom-elevator-action
key.summary: Key combinations for a touchring or touchstrip custom action
key.description: The keyboard shortcuts generated when a touchring or touchstrip is used for custom actions (up followed by down).

key.name: oled-label
key.description: Label will be rendered to OLED display belonging to the button
